body.p: HP Helion Development Platform version 1.2 contains the Application Lifecycle Service, Database, Marketplace, and Messaging services.
Each of these services can be uninstalled using the appropriate process.
body.note: These services cannot be uninstalled from the Horizon console.
The uninstall instructions listed here do not delete existing database instances. Perform all n backup, if necessary, and then delete your existing database instances as applicable.

li.xref: Uninstall the HP Helion Development Platform

body.p: The HP Helion Development Platform is installed in the overcloud of HP Helion OpenStack

section.title: Uninstall the HP Helion Development Platform

ol.li: Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environment variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Source the overcloud administrator credentials.source $TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/overcloudrc
Remove the service from Keystone.SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="development-platform" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID
Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environment variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Source the overcloud administrator credentials.source $TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/overcloudrc
Remove the service from keystoneSERVICE_SHORT_NAME="als" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID
Find the ID for the image named "Application Lifecycle Service Installer".glance image-list
Remove the image from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Find the ID for the image named "Application Lifecycle Service Seed Node".glance image-list
Delete the image from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Find the ALS CSU images in the Sherpa cache.swift list sherpa-cache
Remove the images from the Sherpa cache.swift delete sherpa-cache <ITEM>
Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environment variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Source the overcloud administrator credentials.source $TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/overcloudrc
Remove the service from Keystone.SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="messaging" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID
Find the Messaging images in Glance.msgaas-rabbit-cluster_x.x.x.x glance image-list
Delete the images from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Find the Messaging CSU images in the Sherpa cache. These images will be named msgaas_.x.x.x.x.csu swift list sherpa-cache
Delete the Messaging images from the cache.swift delete sherpa-cache <ITEM>
Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environment variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Source the overcloud administrator credentials.source $TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/overcloudrc
Remove the service from Keystone.SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="database" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID

Find the ID's for the database images. The images will have the following names: dbaas-api_x.x.x.x, dbaas-conductor_x.x.x.x, dbaas-database_x.x.x.x, dbaas-guest_x.x.x.x, dbaas-messaging_x.x.x.x, dbaas-taskmanager_x.x.x.x glance image-list
Remove the images from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Remove the Heat templates from Swift.swift delete DBaaS-heat-templates
Find the DBaaS CSU images in the Sherpa cache.swift list sherpa-cache
Delete the items from the cache.swift delete sherpa-cache <ITEM>
Delete the Database as a Service (Trove) control plane:heat stack-delete trove
Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environment variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Source the overcloud administrator credentials.source $TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/overcloudrc
Remove the service from Keystone.SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="marketplace" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2 keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID
Find the ID's for the following image types: marketplace-api_x.x.x.x, marketplace-database_x.x.x.x, marketplace-engine_x.x.x.x, marketplace-messaging_x.x.x.x glance image-list
Remove the images from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Remove Heat templates from Swift.swift delete marketplace-heat-templates
Find the Marketplace CSU images in the Sherpa cache. These images will be named marketplace_.x.x.x.x.csu swift list sherpa-cache
Delete the images from the cache.swift delete sherpa-cache <ITEM>
Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environmental variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Source the overcloud administrator credentials.source $TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/overcloudrc
Remove the service from Keystone.SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="vertica" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID
Find the ID's for the hp-vertica-helion-image-trial-version image types in Glance.glance image-list
Remove those images from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Remove Heat templates from Swift.swift delete marketplace-package-hp-vertica-helion-image-trial-version
Find the Vertica CSU images from the Sherpa cache. These items will be named marketplace_package_hp-vertica-helion-image-trial-version.csu.swift list sherpa-cache
Remove those images from the cache.swift delete sherpa-cache <ITEM>
